Class FailureStrategy

java.lang.Object
  com.install4j.api.beaninfo.FailureStrategy

public class FailureStrategy
extends java.lang.Object

Enumeration class for all possible failure strategies of actions.

See Also:
ActionBeanInfo.setDefaultFailureStrategy(FailureStrategy)
